contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|bobble}} '''Bobble''' may refer to: * [[Bobble water bottle|Bobble]], a portable, reusable, plastic water bottle equipped with its own filtering system. * Small round pieces of fabric that form on natural fabrics through use (such as cotton), formally known as a [[pill (textile)]] * [[Bobble (knitting)]], a form of stitching in knitting * [[Bobble hat]], a knit beanie hat with a "bobble" (pom pom) at the top * Another name for [[stasis (fiction)]] in Vernor Vinge's Peace Authority science fiction series * A [[Bobblehead]] doll is an object that moves or "bobbles" its head * A device used for tying back hair, also known as a [[scrunchie]] {{disambig}}
